tool_description: Compiles and formats various review and sales metrics into a structured format suitable for dashboard visualization and reporting.

time_labels.description: Time period labels for the metrics

dashboard_type.description: Type of dashboard: executive, operational, or detailed

forecast_periods.description: Number of future periods to forecast

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: All metric arrays and time_labels must have the same length.
Invalid dashboard type: Must be 'executive', 'operational', or 'detailed'.
Invalid forecast periods: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 12.
Empty data arrays: All metric arrays must contain at least one value.
usage: Provide arrays of metrics (ratings, volume, sales, conversions) with corresponding time_labels. Configure dashboard_type and forecasting options as needed.

dashboard_data.description: Formatted data structure for dashboard consumption

key_insights.description: Key insights and highlights for dashboard display
